capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to change file ownership arbitrarily
capabilities.name: CHOWN

capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to bypass file permission checks
capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE

capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to bypass permission checks for file operations
capabilities.name: FOWNER

capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to send signals to any process
capabilities.name: KILL

capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to perform network administration tasks
capabilities.name: NET_ADMIN

capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to bind to privileged ports (< 1024)
capabilities.name: NET_BIND_SERVICE

capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to use raw and packet sockets
capabilities.name: NET_RAW

capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to set file capabilities on other files
capabilities.name: SETFCAP

capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to change group ID of processes
capabilities.name: SETGID

capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to transfer capabilities between processes
capabilities.name: SETPCAP

capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to change user ID of processes
capabilities.name: SETUID

capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to modify process scheduling priority
capabilities.name: SYS_NICE

capabilities.description: Pi-hole is able to set system clock and real-time clock
capabilities.name: SYS_TIME

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Pi-Hole

attrs.label: Web Password
attrs.description: The password for Pi-Hole WebUI.

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access
Expose port for inter-container communication
None

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description:
Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.</br>
Only enable this if you are going to use DHCP.

1.3.12.readme:
Pi-hole

Pi-hole is a black hole for Internet advertisements
